alert.note: Alert for Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 11:56AM CDT until May 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northern Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... West Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1155 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Start, or 7 miles southeast of Swartz, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Collinston and Oak Ridge around 1205 PM CDT. Goodwill and Darnell around 1230 PM CDT. Pioneer around 1235 PM CDT. Forest around 1240 PM CDT. Oak Grove around 1245 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
